message.entry: Pattern property must be a 3-D array or a matrix.
Number of rows ({0}) in {1} property value must match the length ({2}) of {3} property value.
Number of columns ({0}) in {1} property value must match the length ({2}) of {3} property value.
Number of pages ({0}) in {1} property value must match the length ({2}) of {3} property value.
Expect {0} property to have length greater-than or equal-to {1,number,integer}.
Expect {0} property to span no more than 360 degrees between its minimum and maximum values.
Number of azimuths, elevations, and frequencies do not match. They must all have the same number of elements, or all but one must be scalar.
Specify the input arguments in the format: Name=Value, Name=Value...
Configuration is not supported. See documentation for more information.
Polarization is not supported. {0} {1} property must be false. See documentation for more information.
The {0} property is not relevant in this configuration of the object.
Elevation query point is outside the azimuth pattern cut.
Azimuth query point is outside the elevation pattern cut.
